channel.title: Math 324 Announcements
channel.description: Announcements for section A of Math 324 at the University of Washington

item.title: Answers to final exam
item.description: Here are the answers. Grades will be posted on Catalyst as soon as I am done grading.

item.title: Exam pick up
item.description: I will be in my office from 9-10 am on Tuesday, August 23, to return exams or answers questions you have about the exam. If you don't pick up your exam on Tuesday, you can send me an email in October, November, or December to pick up your exam. After that, they will be shredded.

item.title: Special Office Hours
item.description: I will be holding special office hours on Thursday from 2-3. This is in addition to my standard office hours Wednesday at 3:30.

item.title: Final Exam Take Home Problem
item.description: You should get started now on the take home problem for the final exam. This problem is due at the beginning of class on Friday, August 19. Information about the final exam is posted on this page.

item.title: Sample Final Exam
item.description: You can begin to prepare for the final exam by looking at this practice final. Notice that the practice final is a 2-hour exam, so is longer than your exam will be. Also, do not neglect to study something just because it is not on the practice exam. Update: I have now posted answers to sample final.

item.title: Quiz 8
item.description: Here are the answers to the quiz from Week 8.

item.title: Important: Plans for next week
item.description: I will be away until Thursday the 11th. There will be a substitute on Monday the 8th. Please Read 16.8 before coming to class that day. There will be no class on Wednesday the 10th. There will be no office hours, but you can ask me questions on the website or by email. Homework will be due as usual on Friday the 12th, and there will be a quiz that day. There will be time for questions about the homework before your turn it in or take the quiz.

item.title: Quiz 6 Makeup
item.description: I have cancelled my office hours today because I'm not feeling well. For those of you who need to make up this week's quiz, you can do so in the comfort of your own home. Please print out the makeup quiz and complete it, following all instructions. Bring the quiz to class on Wednesday or Friday to get credit.

item.title: Quiz 6
item.description: Here are the answers to the quiz from Week 6.

item.title: Homework 7
item.description: You can now get started on homework 7, which is due on Friday, August 5.
